Valparaiso is a port city that used to
be a major stopover point for ships
going from the Atlantic to the Pacific

passage like the bottom of South America
before the Panama Canal opened and then
when the Panama Canal open it became a
ghost city because ships did need to go
to the bottom of South America anymore
this so when the Panama Canal opened up
